which is at a distance of 13 kilometers in Pathanamthitta District of Kerala, India. It was here that Veluthampy Dalawa the Diwan of erstwhile Travancore Kingdom committed suicide at the Mannadi Bhagavathy Temple.

.

Nearest airport is Thiruvananthapuram International Airport.
Adoor is the nearest town and from there buses to every nook and corner of Kerala is available.

Mannadi Bhagavathi temple is very famous. It is an ancient temple with some stone sculptures. The most important festival of this temple is “Ushabeli”, which falls in February/March.
Kerala Institute of Folklore and Folkarts.
Purchases can be made at Adoor the nearest town.
Eating and Dining can be had at Adoor before traveling to Mannadi.
Adoor the nearest town has some lodges and hotels where accommodation can be had at decent rates.
